criteria.name: Focus
criteria.description: Does the reel convey a clear road safety message aligned with the theme?

criteria.name: Creativity and Originality
criteria.description: Is the idea innovative and presented creatively?

criteria.name: Impact
criteria.description: How engaging and effective is the reel in delivering its message?

criteria.name: Visual Appeal
criteria.description: Is the reel visually compelling and professional in presentation?

criteria.name: Adherence to Theme
criteria.description: Does the reel reflect the "Be a Road Safety Hero" theme?

criteria.name: Clarity
criteria.description: Is the audio clear, and does the narrative support the visuals?

criteria.name: Ethical Standards
criteria.description: Does the reel comply with ethical and legal standards?

criteria.name: Relevance
criteria.description: Does the reel connect well with its target audience?
